doc.str: Polysilazane thermosetting polymers for use in chromatographic systems and applications

This invention relates to an amorphous non-glassy ceramic composition that may be prepared by curing, calcining and/or pyrolyzing a precursor material comprising silicon, a Group III metal, a Group IVA metal, and/or a Group IVB metal.

Bahloul, D. et al., "Pyrolysis Chemistry of Polysilazane Precursors to Silicon Carbonitride--Part 1.--Thermal Degradation of the Polymers", J. Mater.
